name: George Kolev
body:
### Hi, Iâ€™m George

I am passionate about supply management and process optimization.  In my current role as a Procurement Analyst at [Clarks](http://www.clarksusa.com) I manage indirect procurement projects for the US and Canada. Earlier, I was at [Vox](https://www.voxsupplychain.com), a supply chain startup based in Cambridge, MA.

My current interests include data science and business analytics. I am pursuing the CPSM certification from the Institute for Supply Management and the the Data Science Specialization, a series of 8 MOOCs (Massive Online Open Coursers) by the John Hopkins Bloomberg School of Public Health, hosted on Coursera.

You can say hello via [Gmail](mailto:gikolev@gmail.com), [LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/in/georgekolev), or [GitHub](https://github.com/gikolev).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
